snippet: The layoffs, said to total 20 to 40, have come in the last week and have not yet been announced to the staff.
abstract: Dow Jones says Wall Street Journal has cut between 20 and 40 staff members in recent weeks.
lead_paragraph: The layoffs, said to total 20 to 40, have come in the last week and have not yet been announced to the staff.

headline.main: Wall Street Journal Said to Have Cut 20 to 40 Jobs
headline.print_headline: Wall Street Journal Said to Have Cut 20 to 40 Jobs
